## TransactableARTH.repayARTH() method

Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
repayARTH(amount: Decimalish): Promise<TroveAdjustmentDetails>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./arth-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of ARTH to repay. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TroveAdjustmentDetails](./arth-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./arth-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ repayARTH: amount })

```
